(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNS pictures))
    (VP (VBP say)
      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (NP (DT all))))
    (. .)))


det(pictures-2, The-1)
nsubj(say-3, pictures-2)
root(ROOT-0, say-3)
nsubj(all-5, it-4)
xcomp(say-3, all-5)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ comes)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NNP Durians))))
      (, ,))))


advmod(comes-3, When-1)
nsubj(comes-3, it-2)
root(ROOT-0, comes-3)
prep(comes-3, to-4)
pobj(to-4, Durians-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we) (NNPS Singaporeans))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB throw)
        (NP
          (NP (DT any) (NN manner))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN decorum))))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT the) (NN wind)))))
    (. .)))


dep(Singaporeans-2, we-1)
nsubj(throw-4, Singaporeans-2)
aux(throw-4, will-3)
root(ROOT-0, throw-4)
det(manner-6, any-5)
dobj(throw-4, manner-6)
prep(manner-6, of-7)
pobj(of-7, decorum-8)
prep(throw-4, to-9)
det(wind-11, the-10)
pobj(to-9, wind-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ few) (NNS times))))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (ADVP (RB actually))
            (VP (VB eat)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS hands))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(one-3, It-1)
cop(one-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, one-3)
prep(one-3, of-4)
det(times-7, the-5)
amod(times-7, few-6)
pobj(of-4, times-7)
mark(eat-12, that-8)
nsubj(eat-12, you-9)
aux(eat-12, can-10)
advmod(eat-12, actually-11)
ccomp(one-3, eat-12)
prep(eat-12, with-13)
poss(hands-15, your-14)
pobj(with-13, hands-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB get)
      (NP (NN durian))
      (PP
        (ADVP (DT all))
        (IN over)
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN face))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, get-1)
dobj(get-1, durian-2)
advmod(over-4, all-3)
prep(get-1, over-4)
poss(face-6, your-5)
pobj(over-4, face-6)


(ROOT
  (S (CC and)
    (VP (VB talk)
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth))
          (ADJP (JJ full)
            (PP (IN without)
              (NP
                (NP (NN mom))
                (VP (VBG telling)
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (PRT (RP off)))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(talk-2, and-1)
root(ROOT-0, talk-2)
prep(talk-2, with-3)
poss(mouth-5, your-4)
pobj(with-3, mouth-5)
amod(mouth-5, full-6)
prep(full-6, without-7)
pobj(without-7, mom-8)
partmod(mom-8, telling-9)
dobj(telling-9, you-10)
prt(telling-9, off-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB especially) (RB so))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (NN mom))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADVP (RB also))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ thick))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS things)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(so-4, This-1)
cop(so-4, is-2)
advmod(so-4, especially-3)
root(ROOT-0, so-4)
advmod(is-7, when-5)
nsubj(is-7, mom-6)
advcl(so-4, is-7)
advmod(is-7, also-8)
prep(is-7, in-9)
det(thick-11, the-10)
pobj(in-9, thick-11)
prep(thick-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, things-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Yes))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Yes-1)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB when))
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ comes)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS durians))
            (, ,)))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN fruit))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ main) (NN focus))
                (CC and)
                (ADVP (NN nothing))
                (RB else)
                (NP (NNS matters))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(fruit-4, it-1)
cop(fruit-4, is-2)
det(fruit-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, fruit-4)
nsubj(focus-9, that-5)
cop(focus-9, is-6)
det(focus-9, the-7)
amod(focus-9, main-8)
rcmod(fruit-4, focus-9)
cc(focus-9, and-10)
advmod(focus-9, nothing-11)
advmod(focus-9, else-12)
dep(focus-9, matters-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT No) (NN one))
    (VP (VBZ bothers)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNS tables))
          (VP (VBP are) (RB not)
            (VP (VBN cleaned))))))
    (, ,)))


det(one-2, No-1)
nsubj(bothers-3, one-2)
root(ROOT-0, bothers-3)
mark(cleaned-9, that-4)
det(tables-6, the-5)
nsubjpass(cleaned-9, tables-6)
auxpass(cleaned-9, are-7)
neg(cleaned-9, not-8)
ccomp(bothers-3, cleaned-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB throw)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS seeds))
              (PP (IN into)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ dirty) (JJ plastic) (NN box))))))
        (CC and)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ permissible)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB stuff)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ whole) (NN durian) (NN segment))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth)))
                    (SBAR (IN because)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBD got)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB use)
                                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS hands))
                                (S
                                  (VP (TO to)
                                    (VP (VB open)
                                      (NP (DT the) (NN durian)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


mark(throw-4, that-1)
nsubj(throw-4, you-2)
aux(throw-4, can-3)
root(ROOT-0, throw-4)
det(seeds-6, the-5)
dobj(throw-4, seeds-6)
prep(throw-4, into-7)
det(box-11, a-8)
amod(box-11, dirty-9)
amod(box-11, plastic-10)
pobj(into-7, box-11)
cc(throw-4, and-12)
nsubj(permissible-15, it-13)
cop(permissible-15, is-14)
conj(throw-4, permissible-15)
aux(stuff-17, to-16)
xcomp(permissible-15, stuff-17)
det(segment-21, a-18)
amod(segment-21, whole-19)
nn(segment-21, durian-20)
dobj(stuff-17, segment-21)
prep(stuff-17, in-22)
poss(mouth-24, your-23)
pobj(in-22, mouth-24)
mark(got-27, because-25)
nsubj(got-27, you-26)
advcl(stuff-17, got-27)
aux(use-29, to-28)
xcomp(got-27, use-29)
poss(hands-31, your-30)
dobj(use-29, hands-31)
aux(open-33, to-32)
xcomp(use-29, open-33)
det(durian-35, the-34)
dobj(open-33, durian-35)


(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP
      (NP (PRP it))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (DT a) (NN chicken) (NN drumstick)
          (CC and)
          (NN everyone) (NN will))))
    (VP (VB be)
      (VP (VBG staring)
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (PRP you)))))
    (. !)))


aux(staring-11, Do-1)
nsubj(staring-11, it-2)
prep(it-2, with-3)
det(drumstick-6, a-4)
nn(drumstick-6, chicken-5)
pobj(with-3, drumstick-6)
cc(drumstick-6, and-7)
nn(will-9, everyone-8)
conj(drumstick-6, will-9)
aux(staring-11, be-10)
root(ROOT-0, staring-11)
prep(staring-11, at-12)
pobj(at-12, you-13)
